Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a point in Z^2 space. It provides a way to compare and hash points and perform Manhattan-distance calculations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int x
      X,Y coordinates of this point.
      private int y
      X,Y coordinates of this point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point(int x, int y)
      Constructs a new Z^2 point at the given coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int distanceTo(Point other)
      Calculates Manhattan distance to another point.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Checks equality with another point based on its (x.y) coordinates.
      int getX() 
      int getY() 
      int hashCode()
      Hashes this point based on its (x,y) coordinates.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the point to an assignment-friendly output format (two space-separated integers).

        Returns:

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks equality with another point based on its (x.y) coordinates. They are equal iff their coordinates match.
